# UIAccessibility.GuidedAccessRestrictionState.deny

**Case**

The app should deny the user from performing the action controlled by the restriction.

## Declaration

```swift
case deny
```

## Constants

- **UIAccessibility.GuidedAccessRestrictionState.allow**: The app should allow the user to perform the action controlled by the restriction.

items.description: The app should allow the user to perform the action controlled by the restriction.
